backdrop.description: A backdrop used under other canvasses to provide more depth

brandLight.description: Lighter variant of the background tinted to the brandâ€™s primary colour

brand.description: Used sparingly to highlight areas of the interface

inverse.description: Inverse colour to provide sufficient contrast on strong darker backgrounds

light.description:
Lightest divider colour
Default on white backgrounds

medium.description:
Medium divider colour
Default on light grey backgrounds

dark.description:
Darkest divider colour
Used when more differentiation is required
Used as the default border for input fields

inverse.description: Colour of the inverse border colour

brand.description: Used when brand differentiation is required. Tabs, vertical tabs, side navs.

default.description: Primary interactive colour for texts, borders and background on canvas.default

hover.description: Background of a primary interaction when hovered over

active.description: Background of a primary interaction when pressed

default.description: Solid light background based on the main interactive colour

hover.description: interaction.main-light.default in a hover state

default.description: Secondary interactive colour for texts, borders and background on canvas-default

hover.description: Background of a secondary interaction when selected

active.description: Background of a secondary interaction when selected

default.description: Light background of a secondary interaction

hover.description: Light background of a secondary interaction when hovering

active.description: Light background of a secondary interaction when pressed

default.description: Danger colour for texts, borders and background

hover.description: Background and borders using critical-default when hovered over

active.description: Background and borders using critical-default when pressed

hover.description: Light critical background when hovered over

default.description: Warning background. Yellow is too light to be used for text colour, so this can only be used for background and border.

hover.description: Warning background when hovered
Light warning background when hovered

default.description: Success colour for texts, borders and background

hover.description: Background and borders using success.default when hovered over
Light background for success colours when hovered

active.description: Light background for success colours when pressed

hover.description: Light background for neutral colours on hover

active.description: Light background for neutral colours when pressed

hover.description: muted.main.default when hovering
muted.sub.default when hovering
muted.critical.default when hovering
muted-neutral.default when hovered over
Translucent background tinted with the main interactive colour, upon hovering

active.description: Translucent background tinted with the main interactive colour, upon pressing

hover.description: Translucent background tinted with the critical interactive colour, upon hovering

active.description: Translucent background tinted with the critical interactive colour, upon pressing

hover.description: Translucent background tinted with the neutral colour, upon hovering

active.description: Translucent background tinted with the neutral colour, upon pressing

hover.description: Translucent background tinted with the neutral colour, upon hovering

active.description: Translucent background tinted with the neutral colour, upon pressing

unselected.description: To denote unselected regions of the interface. Used for toggles and progress indicators

selected.description: To be used when a neutral tone is preferred to showcase a selected state

unselected-dark.description: Darker variant to denote unselected foreground elements on canvas-default. Used for tabs

disabled.description: Fill colour of disabled regions, including inputs

disabled-content.description: Colour of disabled foreground elements on the canvas-default or disabled

hover.description: Colour of links when hovered upon

dark-hover.description: Colour of dark links when hovered upon

inverse-hover.description: Colour of inverse links when hovered upon

info.description: Informational feedback colour for texts, borders and background. Can be used for toasts, banners, infoboxes.

info-light.description: Light background alternative to feedback.info. Can be used for toasts and infoboxes.

warning.description: Warning feedback colour for texts, borders and background. Can be used for toasts, banners, infoboxes.

warning-light.description: Light background alternative to feedback.warning. Can be used for toasts and infoboxes.

success.description: Success feedback colour for texts, borders and background. Can be used for toasts, banners, infoboxes.

success-light.description: Light background alternative to feedback.success. Can be used for toasts and infoboxes.

critical.description: Critical feedback colour for texts, borders and background. Can be used for toasts, banners, infoboxes.

critical-light.description: Light background alternative to feedback.critical. Can be used for toasts and infoboxes.

focus-default.description: Default focus ring over interactive elements of the interface

focus-inverse.description: Inverse focus ring over interactive elements of the inverse interface

input-prefilled.description: Background of an input field when prefilled

heavy-1280.description: Used for layout headings, usually on landing pages. This will scale according to breakpoints (1280 and above)

heavy-480.description: Used for layout headings, usually on landing pages. This will scale according to breakpoints (480-1279)

heavy.description: Used for layout headings, usually on landing pages. This will scale according to breakpoints (0-479)

light-1280.description: Used for layout headings, usually on landing pages. This will scale according to breakpoints (1280 and above)

light-480.description: Used for layout headings, usually on landing pages. This will scale according to breakpoints (480-1279)

light.description: Used for layout headings, usually on landing pages. This will scale according to breakpoints (0-479)

heavy-1280.description: Used in product pages as headings. This will scale according to breakpoints (1280 and above)

heavy-480.description: Used in product pages as headings. This will scale according to breakpoints (480-1279)

heavy.description: Used in product pages as headings. This will scale according to breakpoints (0-479)

light-1280.description: Used in product pages as headings. This will scale according to breakpoints (1280 and above)

light-480.description: Used in product pages as headings. This will scale according to breakpoints (480-1279)

light.description: Used in product pages as headings. This will scale according to breakpoints (0-479)

subhead-1.description: This is for non-paragraph copy which requires more emphasis, such as subheadings, labels, buttons.

subhead-2.description: This is for the same uses as subhead-1, except on smaller, denser interfaces.

subhead-3.description: This is for subheadings which require more differentiation, and could be used in tabs or paragraph titles.

body-1.description: This is for default body copy, suitable for public facing content.

body-2.description: This is for smaller and denser admin interfaces to save space. Not suitable for body for public facing interfaces, unless of less importance.

body-3.description: This is for long paragraphs. It has a taller line-height than body-1, and allows for breathing space, especially in dense public facing interfaces.

caption-1.description: This is for smaller captions, such as credits. It has a heavier weight for more emphasis.

caption-2.description: This is for smaller captions, such as credits.

code-1.description: This is for large code snippets and larger code elements.

code-2.description: This is for small code snippets and smaller code elements.
